Intro: ^..I am in deep prayer. What do you want?
Where: ^I'm not exactly sure, but I can feel like I know this place somehow. This is why I'm praying to [GODS], to help me remember. Maybe you would know?
Who: ^I...don't remember... I think I am the priestess of this temple? Leave me be please, if you have no further questions.
placeDesc: ^It's a...temple of some kind? As of now I'm still wrapping my head on how I got here in the first place, but it's really beatiful! Which is troubling, because that would mean I'm dead and this is heaven.
Heal: ^...What? I don't know how to heal. Even if I did, I don't heal random strangers.

c-1: ^Nevermind then...You're probably as lost as I am...

WhereAnswers: ^Figures. Could this be a punishment of [GODS]? Robbing us of our recollection?
